ing: 4 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, drained
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers, drained
des: "This recipe I came up with, by trying different things. This recipe has really circled around, all my friends seem to really like it."
ins: In a food processor, combine diced tomatoes with chiles, jalapenos and onion; process until desired texture is achieved.  Transfer to a bowl and stir in the can of green chiles, cilantro, garlic powder and salt.
